content: When using the Gourd with the Thunderbolt Horn equipped, it will moderately increase Shock resistance for a short duration, which can be great against enemies or bosses that deal Shock damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Thunderbolt_Horn.md', within the main section titled 'Thunderbolt Horn'.
The content is as follows:
When using the Gourd with the Thunderbolt Horn equipped, it will moderately increase Shock resistance for a short duration, which can be great against enemies or bosses that deal Shock damage.
